item.title: Hocus Pocus Rerelease Propels The 1993 Film Close To Box Office Milestone Decades Later
item.description: Hocus Pocus was rereleased again, and its weekend totals have put the film extremely close to a major box office milestone decades later.

item.title: Predicting The MCU's 3 Secret Movies With 2028 Release Dates
item.description: The MCU has just added 3 dates to its release schedule in 2028, but none of the dates have an official film attached, but some titles just make sense.

item.title: Dead By Daylight Movie: Confirmation & Everything We Know About The Blumhouse Video Game Adaptation
item.description: The horror mavens at Blumhouse are producing a film adaptation of the popular survival game Dead By Daylight, and terrifying updates are rolling in.
